author: jianyunt
body:
We need to have a proper and consistant file header message in the source files 
-Some source files have no headers.
-Some has "Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation.  All rights reserved."
-Some like OneGet has Apache License

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: I don't think that we actually need consistent header messages (as some codefiles have more specific copyrights based on their heritage), but I'll follow up with legal.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Case 1 is correct. Case 2 is redundant but harmless because the MIT license applies to everything. Case 3 doesn't apply anymore because OneGet is not in this repository.

title: File Headers
